citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:40 on
12-Sep-18.
The licensee was contacted by cell phone from the facility and stated that they were out of town for the day.
